clauses.title: Collaboration Scope
clauses.summary: Meta and ABC Corp will jointly run digital marketing campaigns.

clauses.title: Revenue Sharing
clauses.summary: Net profits from campaigns will be split 60/40 between Meta and ABC Corp.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

insights.message: Well-defined collaboration minimizes financial and operational risk.
Revenue share disputes may arise if campaign metrics are unclear.

evidence.snippet: Both parties shall collaboratively run digital marketing campaigns per agreed strategy.
Net profits will be split 60/40; metrics and calculations documented monthly.
